attributes.action: Recommend the abolition of the house of Lords and replace it with an elected chamber
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current position of the house of Lords is an affront to our democratic way of life.The proposals presently being presented to the commons by the leader of the house to reform the lords fall far short of what is required.It is my view that we need a second fully elected chamber to which any British citizen can stand for election.
